name: Dragon Unleashed
description:
This is a 2D-shooter game designed to be simple.

You play as a dragon with the goal of burning down the entire land of Traventor. But beware, for the king will try to thwart your plans by sending his finest archers after you. Traventor's airships will attack you in large numbers. Score points by shooting them down and bolster your fire breath using various powerups. Make the whole country fear you by creating a devastating hellfire and fight your way to the top of the leaderboard.

This game supports two languages (German and English).
